tool.name: Diurnal Anisotropic Heat
tool.description: This tool calculates a rather simple approximation of the anisotropic diurnal heat (Ha) distribution using the formula:<br/><b>Ha = cos(amax - a) * arctan(b)</b><br/>where <i>amax</i> defines the aspect with the maximum total heat surplus, <i>a</i> is the slope aspect and <i>b</i> is the slope angle. For more details see Boehner & Antonic (2009).
